channel.title: Posts on Academic

item.title: This Site
item.description: I’m always forgetting how to code. It’s not a great trait for someone who’s entire career depends on it. As i said on my homepage I want this site to be a place to keep the kind of snippets I always forget. So to begin I’ll put here the info relevant for the site itself. Firstly, this site is built by Hugo and not Jekyll. I installed Hugo with Homebrew, which is a great package manager for mac computers.
